projects.name: Cyber-Physical Power Grid False Data Injection Detection
projects.description: ML-based system for detecting sophisticated false data injection attacks in power grid SCADA systems using statistical anomaly detection and deep learning.
projects.impact: Achieved 95%+ detection accuracy for coordinated attacks on power grid measurements

projects.name: Medical Imaging KNN Retrieval System
projects.description: Content-based image retrieval system for medical imaging datasets using k-nearest neighbors and deep feature extraction from CNN models.
projects.impact: Enables fast similarity search across large medical image databases for research and diagnosis

projects.name: Line Outage Identification in Power Networks
projects.description: Algorithm for identifying transmission line outages in power systems using real-time measurement data and topology information.
projects.impact: Reduces outage detection time from hours to minutes in real-time grid operations

projects.name: Observability Platform for Distributed Systems
projects.description: Built comprehensive monitoring, logging, and tracing infrastructure for microservices architecture using modern observability tools.
projects.impact: Reduced MTTR by 40% through improved visibility into system health and performance
